question: The World Elder Abuse Awareness Day is observed on ____________.
explanation: The World Elder Abuse Awareness Day (WEAAD) is commemorated on June 15 every year across the world. It aims the importance of preventing financial exploitation in the context of elder abuse to the enjoyment of older persons human rights. The 2017 theme for the WEAAD is "Understand and End Financial Abuse of Older People: A Human Rights Issue".
